p: Nutrition intervention will run through the whole process of radiotherapy and chemotherapy. According to the outcome indicators, the data before radiotherapy and chemotherapy, every two weeks after the beginning of radiotherapy and chemotherapy, and after radiotherapy and chemotherapy are collected. All data will be collected by an assistant, and recorded in detail in the predesigned table. All the research data will be stored in a separate window, and only the researchers of this research group can access the relevant research data.
